rComments: This class seems to be a lot of material that doesn't connect.

I never write any reviews on this website but I just had to do it for Professor Joe. He is the most condescending person I have ever met and the way he presents himself makes him extremely unapproachable. He will ridicule students for asking "stupid questions that wastes his time" and even threatened the class to deduct marks on assessments for it.
teacherRatingTags: ['Tough grader', 'Graded by few things', "Skip class? You won't pass."]

rComments: Ignore the 2 ratings below (same guy trolling). Hardest and worst prof ever. Gives unclear instructions to claim the excuse of "in the real world, things won't be clear". Is all about "design choice", so he'll never answer your questions, so you go and do your own design, and end up getting a bad mark if it's "bad". Ignores you when you're right.

This guy changed my life. Hes honestly one of the few professors that actually made me feel like i was learning. Hes honestly amazing. The assignments were very easy and the exam was straight out of what we learned. No tricks involved. This guy WANTS you to succeed and i love him for it. He is a serious 10/10
I loved his class it was real great. Hes so smart and friendly. Very clear on project instructions and the course was a breeze. This course is a GPA booster HIGHLY RECOMMEND HIM
Prepares you for the real world. Get it straight, it's not about the GPA. You will learn a lot with Joe. He knows what he's doing.

The course was not a walk in the park. You had to work to get the grade you wanted. Assignments sometimes felt like too much work for something that was worth so little, but the lecture content was pretty good. Hated the course while I was taking it, but after working a dev job I realized it was a great and very useful course.
Work is too heavy, you need to spend over 5 hours just for 1%
a awful course
This class had a lot of ambiguity which at first was very annoying. After reflecting on the class from my co-op term, I am starting to understand why it was like this.
teacherRatingTags: ['Lots of homework', 'Tough grader', "Skip class? You won't pass."]

If you want to save you GPA, please wait for two semesters before taking this GPA killer course. All of my grade are 4.0 except for this 'design choice' course

Thank you for the design choice. You let me know how awful the result will be if the assignment code can be re-updated for four times. Thank you for teaching me all the assignment is my design choice(And I spend countless night knowing that I am not a good designer). Thank you very much.

not focused on the testing for the knowledge; TAs are awful as well; keep misleading student(didn't know overriding is not about variables; create his own svn diff format and test on it);  make B07 into Intro to Java; Not teaching at all, all the stuff he taught has better replacement online; Hope he won't be teaching this course anymore.

Actually, if I have a chance to go back to the beginning of this semester, I will drop this course immediately. The professor of this course is so bad that I would rather delay my graduation in order to avoid taking his course. His assignment will not give you a better understanding of the course material. In one word, don't take his course!!!!!
Joe gave great feedback to me when ever I asked him questions.  He went beyond to give me the information I needed.  Too bad his assignments are so hard..

exercises that are unnecessarily long (you will spend around 4 hours making getters and setters) and doesn't test core concepts. Asks us to self learn core concepts such as Iterator, say it is "optional" in the exercise handout, but deduct marks if we don't use it. 3% worth assignment takes at least 12 hours, with getters and setters as the core.
THE ONLY THING YOU NEED TO KNOW IS THAT IT'S A DESIGN CHOICE.

Hardest course yet. I get that the course is called "Software design" but holy crap he apply design choices everywhere.... INCLUDING THE HANDOUTS. Information critical to the assignments are left out,  copy pasting is evident, and starter code is borderline no functional. took 10 hrs to do? 3 percent of final, took 30 hrs? 8% midterm: 10% ?????????
He gives really hard assignments

This professor is actually not very good. He will not give clear document for you to do your exercises. Whenever you have questions about the ambiguous about the question and you really need to be clarified, he will only tell you: it's a design choice. The problem is that if you made the "wrong" choice, you will lose a great amount of mark.
